synopsis.text:
Young Tsubomi Hanasaki, a flower enthusiast and introverted middle school student, finds her life taking an unexpected turn when she moves to Kibougahana and enrolls at Myoudou Academy. Plagued by recurring dreams of a mystical tree and a defeated warrior, Cure Moonlight, she soon discovers that her dreams are more real than she could have imagined. Two fairies, Chypre and Coffret, appear before her, seeking her help to protect the Great Heart Tree from the nefarious Desert Messengers.

When the evil organization targets her new classmate, Erika Kurumi, Tsubomi finds herself transformed into the legendary Pretty Cure, Cure Blossom, to save Erika's Heart Flower. Alongside Erika, who becomes Cure Marine, the two girls embark on a mission to protect the Heart Flowers of everyone in town and restore the Great Heart Tree's vitality. As the weakest Pretty Cure in history, Tsubomi must find the courage and strength within herself to stand against the Desert Messengers and prevent the world from turning into a lifeless desert. Will she rise to the challenge and embrace her new role as a legendary warrior? Join Tsubomi and Erika in their thrilling journey of growth, friendship, and courage in the face of adversity.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
